original_title: Sri Lanka President prorogues parliament till Feb 07
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka President Ranil Wickremesinghe has prorogued parliament with effect from midnight of January 26, according to a gazette notice.
A new sessions of parliament will begin on February 07 with an address  by the President.
All parliamentary committees are automatically dissolved by the prorogation and other business is suspended. (Colombo/Jan26/2024)
